text:
Happy almost Father's Day!

Celebrities like John Stamos, Enrique Iglesias, Aaron Paul and more are enjoying their first Father's Day on Sunday as an official dad. Several have taken to social media to show off the newest additions to their families.

Stars' First Mother's Day 2018

Here's to all the newbie fathers out there.
title: Happy First Time's Father's Day: Celeb Dads Set to Enjoy Special Holiday
